00028 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00029 #include "KviHeapObject.h"
00030 #include "KviCString.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 //
00034 // IANA media-types matching subsystem
00035 //
00036 // WARNING: This class is used in multiple threads
00037 //          Thus every usage of the classes and structures defined
00038 //          in this file MUST be protected by calls
00039 //          to KviMediaManager::lock() and KviMediaManager::unlock()
00040 //
00041 
00042 typedef struct _KviDefaultMediaType
00043 {
00044         const char * filemask;
00045         const char * magicbytes;
00046         const char * ianatype;
00047         const char * description;
00048         const char * commandline;
00049 } KviDefaultMediaType;
00050 
00051 class KVILIB_API KviMediaType : public KviHeapObject
00052 {
00053 public:
00054         KviMediaType(){};
00055         ~KviMediaType(){};
00056 public:
00057         KviCString szFileMask;
00058         KviCString szMagicBytes;
00059         KviCString szIanaType;
00060         KviCString szDescription;
00061         KviCString szSavePath;
00062         KviCString szCommandline;
00063         KviCString szRemoteExecCommandline;
00064         KviCString szIcon;
00065 };
00066 
00067 #endif //_KVI_MEDIATYPE_H_
